pr_title: [risk=no][RW-4928] Don't check Inst Affil on Profile Edit

timeline.bodyText: null-safe check, so it prevents addition and removal as well as updates
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.message:
Because verified institutional affiliation can't be changed, we should not check for it
- move one component behind feature flag
- Don't update VIA on backend

- Disable Inst Role editing

timeline.bodyText: I suspect we'll eventually need to rewrite logic very similar to this when we build out API support for admins to change a user's institutional affiliation – but it's not too much code, and may well be better placed somewhere else for that purpose anyway.
